H0.text: Which vitamin is also known as Niacin or Nicotinic Acid. Vitamin B1

H1.text: Which vitamin is also known as Niacin or Nicotinic Acid. Vitamin B6

H2.text: Which vitamin is also known as Niacin or Nicotinic Acid. Vitamin B9

H3.text: Which vitamin is also known as Niacin or Nicotinic Acid. B3

A4.text: Vitamin B3, colloquially referred to as niacin, is a vitamin family that includes three forms, or vitamers: nicotinic acid (niacin), nicotinamide (niacinamide), and nicotinamide riboside.

A5.text: The term niacin was then adopted internationally by multiple institutions (WHO/FAO, EFSA, FDA, Anvisa) using a broader meaning including all dietary NAD precursors that can prevent signs of deficiency.
